metadata.title: CVE-2022-34678 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer, where an unprivileged user can cause a null-pointerdereference, which may lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-384 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
